channel.title: meetup on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in meetup on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Weekly Digest #9: A little more speed for summer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How quickly the first half of the year speeds up before it slows down. It’s really the second half of 2024 already.

item.title: Weekly Digest #8: Then came the last days of May
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Here’s to hoping for a brighter and better month on this last day of May. We’re in the heat of a community offline meet-up today, gathering to discuss the month’s progress.
